## ShadowOpts type

Options passed to shadow factory creator

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ShadowOpts<TConfig extends TreeConfig> = {
    scopedEffect: CreateScopes['scopedEffect'];
    onCleanup: CreateScopes['onCleanup'];
    adapter: Adapter<TConfig>;
};
```
